DOC.brief_summary: This 2 2 cross-over study evaluate pharmacokinetics telmisartan rosuvastatin FDC compare reference telmisartan rosuvastatin coadministered two group enrol healthy adult male female subject fast condition . Subjects admit clinic evening Day 1 . All subject receive single oral dose telmisartan/rosuvastatin FDC telmisartan rosuvastatin co-administered morning Day 1 . All subject remain clinical unit completion assessment Day 2 include collection post-dose PK sample . Subjects return clinic pharmacokinetic sample schedule time . The two treatment period separate washout period .
DOC.brief_title: PK Study Telmisartan/Rosuvastatin FDC Compared Combination Telmisartan Rosuvastatin
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female age 20 50 body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 kg/m2 2 . Acceptable medical history , physical examination , laboratory test EKG , screen 3 . Provision sign write informed consent 20~50 yr old , healthy Korean Subjects 1 . History clinically significant disease 2 . Sitting blood pressure meeting follow criterion screen : 150 ≥ systolic blood pressure ≤100 ( mmHg ) 100 ≥ diastolic blood pressure ≤ 65 ( mmHg ) amd 100 ≥ Heart rate ≤ 40 3 . A history drug abuse presence positive reaction drug abuse potential urine screening drug . 4 . Administration investigational product within 90 day prior first dosing . 5 . Administration herbal medicine within 28 day administration ethical drug within 14 day administration overthecounter ( OTC ) drug within 7 day prior first dose investigational product ( investigator ( study doctor ) determine person meet criteria appropriately , relevant person may participate study ) . 6 . Have AST ( SGOT ) or/and ALT ( SGPT ) > 3 time normal upper limit time screen 7 . Volunteers consider eligible clinical trial investigator ( study doctor ) due reason include laboratory test result , ECGs , vital sign .
